# Description

Gabriele Mari is a member of an interdisciplinary research group studying the role of fathers for child development. His research centers around the consequences of economic hardship for parents and children, with a focus on what policy can do about it. His research interests broadly include families, social policy, and causal inference. He combines insights from economics, developmental psychology, and sociology.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Gabriele Mari"
special_skill <- "guitar"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", "open access", "data management", "preregistration", all_of(special_skill), "data sharing"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
